creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: complete image of two-sailed junk towing dinghy; dark blue reflection in water; dusk scene with dark sky blending into dark water; twinkling yellow lights in background
inscription: Top edge: Advanced course continued from simple course. Ten more color impression after #8 and finished | bottom: Blocks 6, Impressions 18
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: A Junk
